Perceptor/Elita/Kup

> Torca glanced at Windlord as he was being reprogrammed, his optics
> focusing on the technique involved. He turned back to Kup, "Also I
> have heard that a new Prime has been raised, in addition to Rodimus
> that is already here. Torca's optics looked troubled, "Never has this
> been the case before of having TWO Primes serving together and the
> High council has become troubled by it. They do not know what this
> means."

"At least that no means a big brawl" said dryly Perceptor"If two predacons 
comanders were in same base, that will end in a civil war"

Kup shoock his head "I'm worried about Nightlight... she was acting estrange 
in the predacon base... She tried to ran away, even for Rodimus" he didnt 
dared to said that he was worried about her sanity, he could only imagine 
all the sufering that she had endure inside the Blackfotress

> As Torca talked Bantor seemed to sniff the air for a moment as if he
> caught a scent of something, and then he turned to look in Elita's
> direction, "There is no reason to hide." he said, his voice while
> still rough was softer than normal as he called to the young Maximal
> female.

Elita didnt listen and she tried to open the door where her dad was
